content: sometimes i'm on the all messages tab or if i check a stream that i haven't visited for a long time, it starts from where I had last checked - which means it's a giant marathon scrolling effort. Would be nice if there's an option somewhere that scrolls all the way to the latest message
@DPC, the "End" key goes to the end point
ah uhm i was expecting Page Down, that helps.. thanks :D
@DPC I just discovered it some days ago having a look to the keyboard shortcuts, and it's indeed much more comfortable than scrolling down, even with pagedown!
Would be nice if there was a "scroll to first unread message" option. Since my browser seems to forget where I last was.
@Sebastian Malton yes, that would be very useful
@DPC I'm not 100% sure if I got what you meant but isn't that what G does?
yeh should have checked the shortcuts :D thanks :D
